ol.li: Run the setup script to create the QA run directory, and then cd to the directory:$INTEL_LDK/training/libraries/char/setup/CreateSetup.csh qa cd qa

Run QA on ccslnt lib:./run_QA.csh $LDK_WORKAREA/training/setup/cadence/ldk/stdcells_1278.ldk_demo_lib/lib/base_ ulvt/lib783_i0m_180h_50pp_base_ulvt_tttt_0p700v_85c_tttt_ctyp_ccslnt.lib
Run time is less than five minutes.
The log files are written to the directory ./logs/.
The output reports are written to the directory ./reports/<lib_name>/. For example:
./reports/lib783_i0m_180h_50pp_base_ulvt_tttt_0p700v_85c_tttt_ctyp_ccslnt/
If the specified lib file is an NLDM lib file, only Data Range and Monotonicity checks are run. The other checks apply to data such as CCS, CCSN, and LVF that does not exist in the NLDM lib file.
